headline: CSX (CSX) Margin Decline Challenges Bullish Narratives on Profitability and Growth
summary: CSX (CSX) reported net profit margins of 20.5%, down from 24.7% a year earlier. Earnings have averaged just 0.8% growth per year over the past five years, with recent results in negative territory. Investors are weighing a forecasted 9.5% annual earnings growth and 4% revenue growth against shares trading at $36.6, which sits above the estimated fair value of $33.31. While margins have compressed and profit growth has lagged the broader market, ongoing profitability and relative value in the...
